stories.text:
Traddit for Reddit allows you to Follow Subreddits and Stocks, Reddit Stock Trends, Short Interest data, Earnings Calendar, News with Sentiment Analysis, Real-Time Stock Prices and a Memes Page!

Features that will be added soon: Fed data, FTD data, Darkpool data, Google search trends, politician trades data, daily short volume, whale trades, stock filter tool, Economic and special events calendar as well as podcasts and YouTube videos.
stories.title: Reddit Client that Eliminates Fud and FOMO Using AI
SPI: Automated Identification of Security Patches via Commits
Rivalry: How to Beat a Basic Instinct
Deep Understanding of Commits for Automated Vulnerability Identification
Kickstarter Blockchain Will Combine Crowdfunding with Crypto
Controversial plan to drop poison on the Farallon Islands gets green light

stories.text: When ever I pass by a large digital outdoor screen I imagine computer games being played on it and then I wonder what would be involved in hacking that screen and connecting a computer game console to it. Then I got around to wondering if that’s actually happened anywhere has anyone hacked an outdoor digital screen and run video games on it?
stories.title: Ask HN: Any known cases of large outdoor digital screens being hacked?
